Header.title: Welcome to Dallas
Header.paragraph: Between heatwaves and high-rises, here's a local guide just for you—my favorite spots, hidden gems, and things to know before you visit.

Services.name: Coffee
Services.text: We have a Nespresso machine that can make hot or cold lattes, cappuccinos, or straight espresso - perfect for your caffeine fix!

Features.title: Food & Drink
Features.text: Sharing my favorite recipes, foodie adventures, and cozy coffee shop finds from around the world.

Features.title: Coffee Thoughts
Features.text: Little musings and big ideas — all brewed over a hot cup of coffee. My journal of slow mornings and deep thoughts.

Features.title: Fitness Journey
Features.text: From yoga flows to home workouts, here’s how I try to stay active (and sane) in a busy world.

Features.title: Events & Life
Features.text: Behind-the-scenes of life’s big (and small) moments — weddings, parties, and those random Tuesdays that matter.

Features.title: Travel Stories
Features.text: Wanderlust-fueled stories, tips, and photo dumps from the places that stole my heart — and maybe yours too.
